amendatorysection.catchline: Audiology or speech-language pathology assistant; evaluation, supervision, training; supervisor; report required.
amendatorysection.para: The supervising audiologist or speech-language pathologist shall provide annual reports to the department verifying that evaluation, supervision, and training required by section 38-525 has been completed. The audiologist or speech-language pathologist shall keep accurate records of such evaluation, supervision, and training.
